info.name: Apache Detection
author: philippedelteil
info.description: Some Apache servers have the version on the response header. The OpenSSL version can be also obtained

request:
GET / HTTP/1.1
Host: app.eva.beta.gouv.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Accept: */*
Accept-Language: en
Accept-Encoding: gzip

OPTIONS / HTTP/1.1
Host: app.eva.beta.gouv.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Accept: */*
Accept-Language: en
Accept-Encoding: gzip
response:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Connection: close
Allow: POST,OPTIONS,HEAD,GET
Content-Type: text/html
Date: Sun, 18 Sep 2022 15:25:29 GMT
Server: Apache
Vary: Accept-Encoding
Via: 1.1 alproxy
Content-Length: 0

info.name: HTTP Missing Security Headers
author: socketz
geeknik
g4l1t0
convisoappsec
kurohost
dawid-czarnecki
forgedhallpass
info.description: This template searches for missing HTTP security headers. The impact of these missing headers can vary.
